``````{r Load Packages, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)

#Set the Working Directory
setwd("~/Desktop/GitHub/Bruce_MPQ_Analysis/Data")

```

```{r Load the data}
mpq<- read.csv("~/Desktop/GitHub/Bruce_MPQ_Analysis/Data/BaumLab_Complexity_Data_Clean.csv")

```

```{r VRM Metric Modelling}
mpq
m.1 <- lm(vrm ~ year, data = mpq)
summary(m.1)

m.2 <- lm(vrm ~ hum_dist, data = mpq)
summary(m.2)

m.3 <- lm(vrm ~ year + hum_dist, data = mpq)
summary(m.3)

m.4 <- lm(vrm~year*hum_dist, data = mpq)
summary(m.4)

```
